answers.answer: I was like that my entire pregnancy without the diabetes. I really didnt have much an appetite. I did notice when she had a growth spurt, I would get really hungry. Just nothing sounded good.  I dont think the dr can do anything. Try looking online for recipies. Maybe something will sound good to you. Good luck!

I'm going through the same thing right now except without the gestational diabetes. Nothing sounds good and nothing tastes goodbut if I don't eat something I'll feel sick. I've started trying to satisfy any craving i get wether its really an option or not. (Not an option for you sorry) Saturday my main meals consisted of a soft pretzel with cheese for lunch and supper was blueberry pancakes. Normally i wouldn't eat that much carbs.

Been going through this too. Not so hungry anymore. I will be 34 wks on Wed. And I just don't have much room in my belly.  I always feel full before I start eating.  I read not to drink anything with your meal cause it fulls you up faster but I have yet to try it. Good luck!

question: I'm hungry but nothing ever sounds good anymore. Literally. I have gestational diabetes to which isn't helping my limited food options. Really the only thing I want to eat are carbs or sweets but I can't have those. I'm getting pretty miserable. Can my doctor do anything about this?
title: 34 weeks and no appetite
